contents.text: Don't preen yourself just for doing your job.
Feel free to thank me now.

I suppose I should thank you now that my spirit is
free. This returns Medoh back to its rightful owner!
Your job is far from finished, you know.
The princess has been waiting an awful long time.
I do suppose you've proven your value as a warrior.
A warrior worthy of my unique ability.
The sacred skill that I have dubbed Revali's Gale!

It's now time to move on and start making
preparations for Medoh's strike on Ganon.

But only if you think you'll still need my help while
you're fighting inside Hyrule Castle.
